means: 乙基琥珀酸红霉素酯；利菌沙；红霉素琥珀酸酯

word_mean: 〔USP〕红霉素：一种中谱大环内酯抗生素，C37H67NO13，红霉素链霉菌(Streptomyces　erythreus)产物，为一种微黄色结晶粉末，对大多数革兰氏阳性和某些革兰氏阴性细菌皆有效，如奈瑟氏菌属和流感嗜血杆菌
另对螺旋体、某些立克次氏体及内阿米巴属亦有效验，而对肺炎支原菌(Mycoplasma　pneumoniae)则高度有效
用于治疗敏感微生物所致感染，尤宜于对青霉素过敏的病人、对青霉素有抗药性的感染以及军团病(legionnaires　disease)
本品供口服及局部应用

sentence.Network_en: Recent studies suggested that erythromycin may be effective in prophylaxis against pertussis in exposed, susceptible persons.
sentence.Network_cn: 最近的研究提示,红霉素对暴露于百日咳的易感者,在预防上有效.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the human pharmacokinetics and bioequivalence of erythromycin ethylsuccinate suspension.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的研究琥乙红霉素干混悬剂的人体药代动力学和生物等效性.

sentence.Network_en: OBJECTIVE To prevent dissolutionof erythromycin enteric - coated tablets during the course of storage.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:解决红霉素肠溶片贮存过程中释放度易下降导致不合格的问题.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1950s: from elements of the modern Latin taxonomic name (see above) + -in

means.word_mean: 1. an antibiotic (trade name Erythrocin or E-Mycin or Ethril or Ilosone or Pediamycin) obtained from the actinomycete Streptomyces erythreus; effective against many Gram-positive bacteria and some Gram-negative
